Installation
============

1. Install package from PyPI.

::

    pip install django-mangopay


2. `Create a test client <https://github.com/MangoPay/mangopay2-python-sdk#client-creation-example-you-need-to-call-it-only-once>`_.

3. Add your newly created :ref:`settings_client_id` and :ref:`settings_passpharse` to your django settings, as well as the :ref:`settings_base_url`.

4. To run django-mangopay in production just change the above setting to be the
   settings for your production server.
